tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Nandini Nagar has been a very comfortable doctor who understands the illness well and does not panic the parents. she gives logical reason and symptoms and remedy which could be tried before hospital visits. Does not ask us to visit unnecessarily for hospital, and she would respond comfortably on a call or on whats-app. 
She was treating my daughter earlier and now our new born son.

when it comes to New born / kids, we parents often tend to get tensed up. She would ease us and comfort by explaining the illness, causes and when we need to be cautious.  
My son was supposed to be admitted at hospital, he was not even a month old, however other would have insisted us to admit , but Nandini Nagar understands parents feelings, she did not take admission however responded well on phone call and whats-app. End of the day we all see for a good doctor who is ************** having patience,  good experience, interactive, genuine, reasonable and comfortable doctor.  Not all doctor has all of these, but we could think of Nandini Nagar who fits perfectly. 
We highly recommend as parents of two, she is a very genuine doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Well, it was by accident that Dr. Nandini Nagar was assigned to my eldest son when he was born @ Cloudnine in August 2014. She is been our pediatric since his birth and we are very happy with the way she treats, cares and communicates with the baby. The best part part is that she does not unnecessarily recommend any medicine to the baby unless its critically required. She listens to the parents carefully, patiently and then makes all the suggestions and recommendations on food, medicine or any issues that you might have discussed. When our second kid was born in 2017, some other doctor was assigned and we immediately changed to Dr. Nagar only because of our experience and comfort level with her. I would strongly say that her kai guna   is very good (when she gives vaccination, my son has less pain compared to other doctor). All this is because of her vast experience and specialisation in the Neo Natal care. Due to which she is one of the most busiest doctor at Cloudnine and appointment is must to meet her. I strongly recommend Dr. Nandini Nagar to all the parents for their baby care. I conclude by saying that you feel relaxed after your meeting with her, no matter whatever the problem you have gone with.

I went for  my daughters ear piercing. From making the appointment to the registration process all went well. We had to wait for 1 hr as I opted for painless piercing. Then the problem started. Doctor was late by about 45min. It's ok if the patients waiting are adults and not kids. That's still ok. The doctor must have had an emergency.  But as soon the doc came the medical reps walked straight into the room n there was no staff around to stop them. This gets very annoying when you are waiting with kids. N the sister incharge was so arrogant about it. This is basically the management fault

I visited doctor for the ear piercing of my baby after waiting for a long duration of one hour. Even though it was told to be a painless procedure, the baby was continuously crying for the next 2 hours. 

The earring that I purchased from the Cloudnine hospital was of inferior quality and it fell off the baby’s ear the very next day. Since I didn’t get the appointment of the doctor the next day, I had to visit after 3 days. When I took the appointment, the doctor told that  the baby might have pulled the ear due to which the earring might have fallen off wherein the earring was pretty loose which I can confirm of. I paid around 5-6k for the entire procedure and she told me to wait for another
months to get it  redone. Very rude attitude and demeanour

Hello everyone, I would like to share my experience and kindly advise against choosing a particular doctor for newborns, or infants aged 3 to 6 months. In my experience, this doctor lacks the necessary skills to effectively treat children of this age group. She appears to offer advice without proper consideration and lacks the patience required to care for young children. I recommend avoiding such doctors to ensure the well-being of your babies. It's important to be mindful and make informed decisions regarding your child's healthcare.

Would not recommend this doctor to anyone. Had travelled all the way from Sarjapur Road to Cloudnine Jayanagar to get the ear piercing done for my 6 month old daughter.
I was asked by the practo team to be at the clinic 30 mins before the appointment as there is some gel that needs to be applied. We were a bit late and reached just 20 mins before the appointment. After 45mins, the doctor's tells us that her shift now ends and she cannot wait for the gel to take effect, which needed another 15-20 mins to completely numb the area.

She said that either we can get the piercing done now (without the ear being completely numb) or  come again some other day. Despite asking her repeatedly on what would she recommend to be the best way for my daughter, she was not straightforward enough to say that we should not do it without the ear being completely numb not was she courteous enough to give more weightage to the pain that a 6month old baby may undergo just because she cannot wait for 15 more mins.
I decided not to go by such a doctor and got the piercing done by another doctor at the same clinic with a lot of difficulty.
THIS WAS MY FIRST AND LAST VISIT TO NANDINI NAGAR AND CLOUDNINE JAYANAGAR.

Thanks

Pankaj

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We met the doctor just after our new born was born. As this is our first child (which I explained to the doctor), she only answered to our questions while doing something on her computer. I wish she had devoted some time for us as it is a new experience for us as parents and we have no idea as to what is come and what needs to be done. On one side these doctors tell not to look at Google, and on the other they don't tell us anything themselves - only stick to the questions parents have is no good. Conversely, there were many good aspects of our meeting like the doctor's friendliness, conduct, punctuality, good ********* ** *** ******* **** Hope our feedback is not taken in a negative manner and is used productively. After all, everybody's baby is the most important aspect of their lives and we pay for the service with our hard earned money for which we deserve a satisfying experience. All the best, thank you.

********* ****** **** * ***** ************* ** *** ********* ** *** ******** Very polite and gives all possible time to hear the queries of the parents and solves them then and there. Have been always approachable at any hour of the day or night for quick resolution of queries and concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Nandini Nagar is one of the most honest and cordial doctors that I have come across. She only has the child's best interest and comfort as her priority  at all times. We have even shifted cities inorder to have her as our daughter's pediatrician. She is a true asset.

Had been there for ear piercing. But the hospital doesn't have studs, and neither they won't allow us to get it. They applied the cream and later told there were no earrings. My baby had to suffer.. This was a real bad experience.. Cloud 9 wake up guys!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is no doubt very good. No issue with her. Rather we are very much satisfied with her treatment. But the nurse helping doctor to manage patient was very inefficient. Neither she could manage the appointments nor the patient book. She misplaced our baby book. We had 1 pm appointment which finally completed around 2:30 due to her inefficiency of managing the appointments.

I wouldn't want to share anything more than the bitter experience of her piercing my lil 8day old daughter several times *** ************* ****** *** **** ************ *** ** **** And then rushing her to the NICU *** ******** * ***** ***** *** ******* She wanted to readmit the baby after discharge I'm glad i consulted outside and saved my baby and ofcourse they just made the most out of us. I will never go back to her. Nurses coming along with her were confused. **** ** ***** *********** **** * ***** ***********

****** ** *** **** **** ******** ** **** ***** ******* ***** *** *** ********* **** *** **** **** * **** ************ *** ****** **** **** ** ****** I don’t care as long as she does her job, ***** *** ******* she has pierced my baby’s ears away from marked site making them odd and asymmetrical. When my baby was crying badly I asked if I can console the baby and then pierce and she said no. After the piercing turned out bad she said that much only can be done for a baby and if we don’t like it ,  get it done again! ** ***** ** ************* *** ****** *** ** **** ** ******

Hi,
We are very happy to share my experience with Dr.Nandini Nagar.
Doctor is very friendly and we are very much happy with the treatment.
Our baby is premature..and day one doctor has treated our baby very well.
The way of explained about the baby condition and all was very good.
We are very much satisfied with the treatment,explanation,friendness and more important point is..doctor has more patience to ask our repeated questions

We would like to continue with same doctor for our baby check up.

Thanks...!!

Regards,
Shanta

It's been always wonderful with Dr.Nandini Nagar. She answers all the queries with full on patience without getting irritated. My daughter recovers well only after getting treated by Dr.Nandini Nagar...
She is a wonderful  and beautiful doctor indeed.

It was good, the doctor gave the right advice.. but there was a discrepancy in the consultation charges.. in practo app, the fees shows up as 500, but in the hospital they took 600.. could you please check on this and contact me on the same .. thanks in advance

********* ******* Answers all your queries patiently. Never hesitates to clarify your doubts. Provides guidance at every stage of baby development including medication and baby food. Explains how to handle emergency situations and what medicines should be administered when the baby is unwell. ******* * ********* *******

I came for vaccination for my son. . Got to know the hospital is not having enough stock of all the vaccine. So I was asked to either come next week or get vaccinated with the one available and come next week again for other vaccine. I had come from electronic city.  It is very difficult for me to 2 times for vaccine just because vaccine stock is not available. . Will not orefer to come to cloud 9 for vaccination again..
